name: Layla
title: Fantastical Evening Star
description: She is a recently enrolled student in the Rtawahist Darshan, specializing in Theoretical Astrology. Despite being in poor health and constantly sleep-deprived, Layla has performed excellently in the eyes of her teachers and peers; however, this is not apparent from her numerous lamentations about her studies. Instead, she attributes her success to her sleepwalking and having "The Stars' Blessing."
